titles.title: ROOMIE Act
Reinforce Occupancy Obligations for Maximized Interagency Efficiency Act
ROOMIE Act
A bill to require Federal agencies to impose in-person work requirements for employees of those agencies and to occupy a certain portion of the office space of those agencies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
